channel.title: Changing what it says when you log on
channel.description: when you log on it says welcome and the forum name and the owner name and vote and i was wondering how to change that because i am using somebody elses source they hosted. please help as soon as you can!!!!

item.title: Changing what it says when you log on
item.dc:creator: @fantom fantom
item.description:
@fantom wrote:

[quote=“Hypocryte, post:3, topic:330561”][quote author=mr arrows95 link=topic=426937.msg3135465#msg3135465 date=1266905562]

  1. Open client.java
  2. Search for WELCOME TO LEARN TO RIGHT SECTION SCAPE
  3. Compile
    SERVER HELP
    [/quote]
    Hey give him some props. He doesn’t know that, and at least he posted it in a help section rather than in a completely unrelated section.

@OP - Ctrl+H is all you need, however change more than just the server name and info otherwise you’ll appear to be an asshole.[/quote]
tyvm i got everything to work, and i asked the guy that hosted client and source if it was fine as long as i gave him credits which i did

Read full topic
item.source: Changing what it says when you log on

item.title: Changing what it says when you log on
item.dc:creator: @Hypocryte Hypocryte
item.description:
@Hypocryte wrote:

[quote=“mr arrows95, post:2, topic:330561”]1. Open client.java
2. Search for WELCOME TO LEARN TO RIGHT SECTION SCAPE
3. Compile
SERVER HELP[/quote]
Hey give him some props. He doesn’t know that, and at least he posted it in a help section rather than in a completely unrelated section.

@OP - Ctrl+H is all you need, however change more than just the server name and info otherwise you’ll appear to be an asshole.

Read full topic
